main event: On 4 August 1952, a round yellow-white ball was observed in Phoenix, Arizona, traveling at a constant speed, later elongating into a narrow shape.
interesting points: The object was reported traveling at approximately 200 mph, A witness described the object as being three-fourths the size of a full moon, The sighting lasted around 5 minutes, The observer was performing a routine inspection of an aircraft when the object was noticed, Several sightings on the same day were reported from different angles and distances.
witness description: The witness was a flight superintendent and mechanic with previous experience in the navy.
